thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 6
thread.title_full: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 6 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 6
text:
July 25 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily *** MONDAY, JULY 27
JERUSALEM - Bank of Israel interest rate decision - 1330 GMT. TUESDAY, JULY 28
BRASILIA - Central bank of Brazil holds monetary policy committee meeting (to July 29). SOFIA - Bulgarian parliament will vote to appoint three deputy central bank governors proposed by the new central bank governor as part of his goal to boost trust in the banking system following the collapse of the country's fourth largest lender under murky circumstances last year. WEDNESDAY, JULY 29 KIEV - National bank of Ukraine holds monetary policy committee meeting (to July 30). BANGKOK - Thai finance ministry to update new economic forecasts - 0600 GMT. BRASILIA - Central bank of Brazil announces interest rate decision - 2200 GMT. THURSDAY, JULY 30 HARARE - Zimbabwe Finance Minister Patrick Chinamasa is expected to present his half-year budget speech to parliament - 1300 GMT. EGYPT - Central Bank of Egypt holds Monetary Policy Committee Meeting - 0600 GMT. ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey to hold news conference to announce quarterly inflation report. MEXICO CITY - Central bank of Mexico publishes monetary policy statement. SANTIAGO - Central bank of Chile will publish the minutes of July interest rate meeting - 1130 GMT. SEOUL - The Bank of Korea will release its biannual report on inflation - 0300 GMT. FRIDAY, JULY 31 MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia announces interest rate decision. TUESDAY, AUGUST 4 BUCHAREST - Central Bank of Romania holds interest rate meeting - 0800 GMT. MUMBAI - Reserve Bank of India holds monetary policy meeting. BUDAPEST - Central Bank of Hungary non-rate-setting meeting. WEDNESDAY, AUGUST 5 BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand holds Monetary Policy Committee meeting - 0730 GMT. NAIROBI - Central bank of Kenya holds monetary policy meeting. BUDAPEST - Central Bank of Hungary will publish the minutes of July policy meeting - 1200 GMT.
THURSDAY, AUGUST 6 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank holds monetary policy meeting to announce interest rate decision - 1100 GMT. The bank will also update its quarterly macroeconomic forecast.
